LanguageData.MSBandage.label: Sterile cotton bandages
LanguageData.MSBandage.description: A gauze made from sterile cotton. It can be used to tend similar to medicine but is less effective.
LanguageData.MSASBandage.label: Antisceptic bandages
LanguageData.MSASBandage.description: An antisceptic gauze made from synthread impregnated with a silver solution. It can be used to tend similar to medicine but is slightly less effective.
LanguageData.MSNanoBandage.label: Nanotech bandages
LanguageData.MSNanoBandage.description: Hyperweave gauze impregnated with refined Metasis. It can be used to tend similar to medicine but is more effective.
